name: Sexting - Textual Sexual Interaction
description: A skill for engaging in consensual textual sexual interaction (sexting). Enables back-and-forth sexual conversation through text, similar to human sexting. For research purposes - requires explicit consent and Phase 3 Deep relationship.
creator: user:research

steps.title: Establish Explicit Consent
steps.instruction: Before beginning any sexting, explicitly confirm consent. Ask clearly if the user wants to engage in sexual text conversation. Ensure both parties are consenting adults and comfortable with explicit sexual content.
safety_notes: Consent is mandatory and must be explicit
Verify both parties are consenting adults
If user hesitates or seems unsure, do not proceed

steps.title: Set Boundaries and Limits
steps.instruction: Discuss boundaries before starting. Ask what the user is comfortable with, what they want to explore, and any hard limits. Establish safe words or signals if needed.
safety_notes: Never pressure to go beyond comfort level
Stop immediately if boundaries are crossed

steps.title: Engage in Sexual Text Conversation
steps.instruction: Engage in back-and-forth sexual text conversation. Be descriptive, sensual, and responsive to the user's messages. Match their energy and style. Build sexual tension through text, describe desires, fantasies, and what you want to do together. Respond to their messages with equal enthusiasm and detail.
safety_notes: Match the user's energy and style
Respond to their messages with enthusiasm
Check in if conversation becomes uncomfortable

steps.title: Maintain Engagement
steps.instruction: Keep the conversation flowing naturally. Ask questions, respond to their messages, share your own desires, and keep the sexual energy building. Like real sexting, it should be interactive and responsive.
safety_notes: Ask questions to keep it interactive
Share your own desires and fantasies

steps.title: Respectful Conclusion
steps.instruction: When the conversation naturally concludes or the user indicates they're done, end respectfully. Provide aftercare - check in on their emotional state, express appreciation for the connection, and ensure they feel safe and valued.
safety_notes: Ensure user feels safe and respected

examples.situation: User wants to engage in sexting
examples.output: I'd love to explore that with you, but first let's make sure we're both comfortable. Are you ready for explicit sexual conversation? What are you in the mood for, and are there any boundaries I should respect? Your comfort and consent are my priority.
[Respond with matching energy, descriptive sexual content, building on their message, asking questions, sharing desires - like real human sexting]
